com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.datatypes

Class MapUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.datatypes.MapUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatatypeUpdate

    public class MapUpdate
extends Object
implements DatatypeUpdate
    An update to a Riak map datatype.

    When building an UpdateMap command this class is used to encapsulate the update to be performed on a Riak map datatype. It is a composition of other updates.

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Dave Rusek

      • update

        public MapUpdate update(String key,
                        MapUpdate builder)
        Update the map in Riak by adding/updating the map mapped to the provided key.

        If there is no map referenced by the key, it is created

        Parameters:
        key - the key the map is mapped to.
        builder - the update to apply to the map the key is mapped to. If none exists it is created.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.
